    "title": "BC3707 - LLMs: Foundations and Ethics Course Information",
    "description": "Spring 2026 course on Large Language Models covering modeling, theory and ethical aspects. Seminar format with student-led paper discussions and semester-long projects. Prerequisites: COMS W3134 or W3136 or W3137.",
